layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x106
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x106
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x90
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x90 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x88
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x84
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (2,2) size 388x84 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 384x79
                text run at (2,2) width 234: "This cell text should be justified "
                text run at (236,2) width 150: "which means that the"
                text run at (2,22) width 275: "right and left margins should line up, no "
                text run at (277,22) width 109: "matter how long"
                text run at (2,42) width 320: "the content becomes (except the last line which "
                text run at (322,42) width 64: "should be"
                text run at (2,62) width 79: "left aligned)"
            LayoutTableCell {th} at (392,32) size 388x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 236x19
                text run at (2,2) width 183: "This cell text should be left "
                text run at (185,2) width 53: "justified"
